post.body: Jealous! Not just cuz it's gorgeous, but because Foxen pinots are some of my favorite wines ever. Hope you avoided tipsy drivers.
If you put off getting the flash, try making a DIY diffuser: http://is.gd/1etP I have a film canister but haven't tried it yet.
Tough choice. Only after looking back through my photos did I realize how much I use the Speedlight (& I NEVER use the built-in).
I think lens. I have the equivalent Nikon speedlight and the exact same lenses you have. Could really use a tele lens for races.
That is an awesome night indeed. Christmas will be a letdown after a night like that.
I put the Grant's baits down on Monday, and the ants love it. They are all over it (and the kitchen, still). How long until it works?
Our landlord hired an exterminator, who put out chunks of poison and covered all the potential entry points with fine wire mesh.
I think all you can do is poison or trap them -- then you have to find and dispose of the carcasses or live with the smell (& flies).
Red Vines, end of discussion. Twizzlers taste like vinyl. Red Vines taste like delicious RED flavor. :)
Mazel tov! I LOVE my Soloist. Aren't you glad you didn't buy that wetsuit? :)
Arsenic! Awesome. Luckily I have no kids or pets. And only occasionally eat off the floor. Thx for the tip (and thx @sabele too).
Marathon & Beyond is one of the ones I just bought. A friend of mine writes articles for them every now and then.
$40 in shelf stackers made it much easier. I just wish I had done it before feeding about 45 cumulative people over the holidays!
I find that brisk house cleaning also warms me up effectively.
sadly (or not), the rumored $99 Walmart iphone turned out to be a $197 Walmart iphone. woo-hooo $2 discount! http://is.gd/eerd
Some of the newer smaller Treo models have Windows Mobile... but I wouldn't touch that OS with a 10-foot usb cable!
I have tried it, briefly... doesn't the Centro use Palm OS?
why horrible? the phone I'm replacing is an ancient Nokia 6682, a smartphone with a similar form factor to the Centro. (kinda.)
I already ran today... but maybe I'll go for another run so I can use my new HRM? :) It's been 7 weeks since I ran with one.
The UPS guy delivered my replacement Polar about ten minutes ago. Great timing! Thanks so much for your help!
I'm a little sad that my cyclocross season is done. I ended up 3rd in my category at LARPD! Gorgeous, chilly day was a nice way to end it.
QOTD: "He was 'a little strange,' but no more strange than the average Berkeley resident, Dawson-Haggerty said." http://tinyurl.com/3qeeu8
I picked the right week to make a giant pot of chicken-veggie-noodle soup.
Just sat down in our 52-degree dining room and my tuckus nearly froze to the wooden chair. I understand now why people use seat cushions.
Thank you, FedEx customer service lady whose name I forgot to write down, for being awesome.
Storing two bottles of honey in the sink to keep ants from swarming them. Anyone have a strategy for successful ant eradication?
I have about 800 unread magazines. A year of New Yorkers, food & travel mags, cycling & running mags. Why on earth did I just buy 2 more?
36F outside and I'm going for my first bike ride of the year. Am I CRAZY?
Basking in the glory of freshly reorganized dining room cabinets. Such a beautiful sight.
Thinking it would be good if I just didn't eat anything for about a week. Oof.
Waiting for the Ramoneskis (Russian Ramones tribute band) to take the stage at the #pigandwhistle.
I put "There She Goes" on the jukebox at the #pigandwhistle and the whole bar started singing along.
Happy birthday @parrishioner!
Need new phone badly. Should I spring for an iphone or get a (free) Palm Centro? I like having a tactile keypad. Mac connectivity essential.
So happy to see sunshine! Driving home after two nights in beautiful but soggy Humboldt County.
Swam with Coach Oleg for the first time in a month or two. He actually told me "no pain, no gain" ...in his inimitable Slavic accent.
I realized a few minutes ago that we have both vanilla ice cream and homemade root beer in the house. Aww yeaaah. http://tinyurl.com/932bat
Ran twice today. The second run was better than the first. Maybe it was the limpa-bread french toast I had right before heading back out.
Swedish meatballs, mashed potatoes, potato korv, green beans, 3 kinds of limpa bread, lingonberries, cuke salad, beets, herring. God Jul!
